metadata.title: CVE-2018-11224 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Libav 12.3. A read access violation in thein_table_init16 function in libavcodec/aacsbr.c allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash), as demonstrated by avconv.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
